Oh, it's just a mosquito bite.
Not really, but it's a bit itchy now.
I don't want it to get infected. Remember that time I got bitten and the bite swelled up?
Yes, prevention is always better than cure.
I don't know, I came back and found my things like this.
Not yet, I am still too shocked.
I just can't believe it. My favorite books, my clothes, my jewelry, all ruined.
It feels like we've been through so much together.
It's just stuff though, we should focus on what's really important.
I just hope whoever did this is caught soon.
